definition: danger spot/Jedi (in Star Wars)
to cut short/extinct/to disappear/to vanish/absolutely/by no means
-ly/structural particle: used before a verb or adjective, linking it to preceding modifying adverbial adjunct
earth/ground/field/place/land/CL:片[pian4]

sentences.english: Lightsabers have changed little in the thousands of years of their employ by the Jedi Knights.
sentences.chinese: 在絕地武士使用光劍的幾千年裏，光劍的變化不大。

sentences.english: They caught up with the old Jedi in a hidden hangar.
sentences.chinese: 他們在一個隱蔽的機庫裏追上了這名老絕地。

sentences.english: The beleaguered Jedi Knights fought valiantly to repulse the Mandalorian marauders.
sentences.chinese: 被圍攻的絕地武士英勇戰鬥，擊退了曼達洛強盜。

sentences.english: He kept rabbiting (on) about the poor pay.
Can he play Lazarus one last time?
sentences.chinese: 現在他能最後一次上演絕地反擊嗎？

sentences.english: The loyal clone troopers executed their treasonous Jedi generals in cold blood.
sentences.chinese: 忠誠的克隆人士兵冷酷地處決了叛國的絕地將軍們。

sentences.english: Luke’s journey to becoming a Jedi Knight would have had a lot more bumps.
sentences.chinese: 盧克成爲絕地武士的旅程原本要更加坎坷。

sentences.english: You've proved yourself worthy of the title of Jedi Master.
sentences.chinese: 證明了自己無愧於絕地大師的稱號。

sentences.english: Jabba's enforcers were no match for a group of determined Rebels led by a Jedi Knight.
sentences.chinese: 賈巴的打手無法與絕地武士領導的頑強義軍相匹敵。

sentences.english: The frozen Dark Jedi lured Aayla to his tomb, and had her deactivate the stasis shield.
sentences.chinese: 被冰凍的黑暗絕地引誘她進入墳墓，打開了封印罩。

sentences.english: For the first time in ages, Jedi and Sith dueled.
sentences.chinese: 這是許多年以來，絕地和西斯的第一次對決。

sentences.english: Now face oblivion like all of the Jedi before you.
sentences.chinese: 現在面對死亡吧，就向你之前的絕地武士一樣。

sentences.english: Windu arranged a group of Jedi Masters to arrest the Chancellor.
sentences.chinese: 溫杜安排了一隊絕地大師去捉拿議長。

sentences.english: As such, he came to be regarded as a Jedi of mystery, an unapproachable enigma.
sentences.chinese: 因此，他被看作一個神祕的絕地，一個無法接近的謎。

sentences.english: Aurra continued to kill Jedi as the Republic began to decay and crumble around her.
sentences.chinese: 當共和國腐朽敗落之時，奧拉繼續殺害絕地。

sentences.english: But what happens when a Jedi loses his memory?
sentences.chinese: 但如果一名絕地失憶會有何後果？

definition: lit. to directly attack Huanglong/fig. to directly combat the root of a problem
no room to advance or to retreat (idiom); without any way out of a dilemma/trapped/in an impossible situation
no way out/nowhere to go/trapped beyond hope of rescue/painted into a corner
microphone/to use a microphone
location on wrist over the radial artery where pulse is taken in TCM
to be drowned (figurative and literal)
isolated/solitary
the earth's axis
opponent/substantial adversary/worthy match/antagonist/in the enemy's hands
to be buried in a horse hide (idiom)/to give one's life on the battlefield
evening mist/fig. declining spirits/lethargy
variant of 兇惡|凶恶, fierce/ferocious/fiendish/frightening
eager to win/competitive/aggressive
long-range raid
to touch base matter and turn it to gold (idiom); fig. to turn crude writing into a literary gem
extreme joy turns to sorrow (idiom); Don't celebrate too soon, things could still go wrong!
